exceptions.tactic: intros aP R Q a b H1 H2 H3 c Q1 H4 H5 H6 H7.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce redIn to an evaluable reference.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a aP H0 : In b aP H1 : redIn a b aP Q R c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2 : Q = c :: Q1 p, q : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R p q H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R q Unable to unify "redIn ?M2338 ?M2339 ?M2335 Q ?M2337" with "redIn a b aP Q1 R".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a aP H0 : In b aP H1 : redIn a b aP Q R c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2 : Q = c :: Q1 p, q : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R p q H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R q Unable to unify "Q = c :: Q1" with "redIn a b aP Q1 R".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a aP H0 : In b aP H1 : redIn a b aP Q R c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2 : Q = c :: Q1 p, q : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R p q H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R q Unable to unify "redIn ?M2338 ?M2339 ?M2335 Q ?M2337" with "redIn a b aP Q1 R".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a aP H0 : In b aP H1 : redIn a b aP Q R c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2 : Q = c :: Q1 p, q : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R p q H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R q Unable to unify "redIn a b aP Q R" with "redIn a b aP Q1 R".

original: intros aP R Q a b H1 H2 H3 c Q1 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold redIn in H3. destruct H3. - apply redIn0 with (Q:=Q). apply H2. - apply redIn1 with (Q:=Q). apply H1. - injection H5 as H8 H9. rewrite <- H8 in H6. apply H9.
